DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective of the SONOMA Registry is to confirm the safety of the NexStent® Carotid Stent System and FilterWire EZ™ Embolic Protection System in routine clinical practice and to identify rare or unanticipated device-related events that might occur.
DOC.brief_title: Post-Approval Study of the NexStent Carotid Stent System and the FilterWire EZ Embolic Protection System: SONOMA
DOC.detailed_description: The SONOMA Registry will enroll approximately 300 subjects at a maximum at 78 study centers.
DOC.criteria: Candidates must be indicated for carotid stent placement as per NexStent Carotid Stent labeling located in the Directions for Use (DFU). Subjects with contraindications as outlined in the DFU should be excluded from this registry.
